thread.title: The 14th Annual Calusa Blueway Paddlesport Fishing Tournament
thread.title_full: The 14th Annual Calusa Blueway Paddlesport Fishing Tournament

title: The 14th Annual Calusa Blueway Paddlesport Fishing Tournament
text:
The 14th Annual Calusa Blueway Paddlesport Fishing Tournament Where 
4530 Pine Island Rd NW Cape Coral, FL 33993 Categories 
Events, Outdoors | Recreation, Sports The 14th Annual Calusa Blueway Paddlesport Fishing Tournament presented by Estero River Outfitters and Gulf Coast Kayak will be held on Saturday November 14th 2015. This tournament is one of the best upcoming popular catch-and-release fishing tournaments and is expected to draw 80 anglers to Lee County waterways as part of the Calusa Blueway Paddling Trail along the shores of Southwest Florida. The one-day competition will implement the catch, photo and release method of Snook, Redfish, Seatrout and other species. All fishing must occur on Lee County, Fla., waterways. The captains’ meeting and dinner will be at the Olde Fish House Marina in Matlacha on November 13th at 6:00PM. Fishing begins at safe light. Check-in will begin at 1:30PM at Old Fish House Marina. All competitors must be in the check-in line with their cameras and measuring devices by 3 p.m. to be eligible for prizes. Prizes this year will be 1st Place – Hobie Kayak, $2500 Value, 2nd Place $500, 3rd Place $250, 7th Place $150, 13th Place $100 and 20th Place-Entry 2016. All competitors must be 18 years or older or be accompanied by a parent or guardian. Entry Fee for the tournament will be Tandem Paddlesport Team $130.00 and a Single Paddlesport Angler is $65.00. You may register on line at https://2015calusabluewaypaddlesportfishingtournament.eventbrite.com
